metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15928 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In the Ox gem 2.8.0 for Ruby, the process crashes with a segmentation fault when a crafted input is supplied to parse_obj. NOTE: the vendor has stated "Ox should handle the error more gracefully" but has not confirmed a security implication.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15928` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-ox - 2.1.1-2+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-ox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-2+deb9u1build0.16.04.1').
